title: Biomedical Engineering Practice-Centered Modular Learning: Exploring Social Application Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational biomedical engineering concepts and experimental design methodologies
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment for working professionals, focusing on case studies of biomedical engineering applications for solving social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more stages of how bioengineering technology is applied to medical device development processes.
Learners can submit a project design document for solving social issues based on tissue engineering on an LMS platform.
Learners can analyze drug development regulatory requirements and write an ethical review report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
